reviews.review_text: I've tried a few other facial oils, like Josie Maran, but wasn't impressed. The first two days that I used this oil, I didn't feel it was going to do much. However, after using the oil day and night for a week, my skin is GLOWING. Never going back to synthetic creams!!

I love this product.  A little goes a long way so it will last forever.  The bottle classes up a bathroom no problem, the packaging is grade A classy.  It smells lightly of something lovely AND it does a great job moisturizing my face.  No more dry patches.  No more weird white bumpy forehead zits.  Really even steven's out my skin tone too. These people make good stuff.

I broke down and purchased all three of these oils....and they are all so amazing.  I use the Lapis for the day time and the orchid for night time. The Phoenix I reserve for after I have a facial treatment or if I do a spa day at home.  I have very oily skin and since I started using these I find my skin isn't as oily, my breakouts are less frequent and less severe.  I use four drops for my face and neck and feel these would last a long time. I will be repurchasing when they are all used up, but that won't be for a while.

I LOVE this oil! I have combo/oily skin that gets dry patches occasionally. A friend turned me on to this saying it would balance everything out. It sure did! I've been using this just under a year and I use about 8 drops every morning and night. My skin looks glowy without being greasy. Makeup lays perfectly on top of it (after about 15 minutes of it soaking in). NOTE: you WILL look like a greased chicken immediately after application. Let it soak in (everyone's skin absorbs at different rates) and then you'll see the balanced effect.

Now that you know my skin type, I've been using this for about a month, I didn't want to write a review until that month had passed. I've been using this religiously day and night. I have noticed that my skin is more balanced, my nose which used to be a huge problem is now controllable, I really feel this product helped me a lot. Of course I use other products and other oils but they all do their own thing, and this that claims to be balanced is absolute correct. I don't feel it clogs up my pores and the best and most important of all for those who love using oils in the morning, this wears well under makeup, and I mean super well, there's no worrying about it looking greasy or anything. I would completely recommend this. One thing I must say, if you're sensitive to scents, maybe not. The scent does not linger, but it does have a minty chalk scent, I for one don't really like it, but the results are what I'm looking for so I bear with it.

Obsessed. I have acne-prone combination skin and this is my love. I use it after Boscia's cleansing oil at night and then in the morning when I wake up. I let it sink in before applying a BB cream (Dr. Jart black label) and it's perfect! My acne is almost eliminated, with what's left depending upon what I eat. I love that it's vegan too!

I have been using this oil for the past few months and it's great for dry/cold atmospheres. I have combination/sensitive skin and I get acne once a month. I find that it helps to balance out the oil and keep my skin hydrated throughout the night, while I am sleeping. A little goes a long way. I'm not sure if I would use this in the summer, but it's great for the fall and winter seasons.

I want to start off by saying that as you can see, the Lapis oil is targeted for people with combo/oily and acne prone skin. However, I am the complete opposite. My skin is dehydrated and dry, sensitive, and I also have eczema. THIS STUFF IS HEAVEN. I have the orchid and Phoenix roller balls as well and they are great. I love all of them. But the Lapis oil just really does it for me. I figured that the Phoenix would be the best for me, but I actually love the Lapis better!! My face is so soft, it hasn't irritated my skin in any way (nothing from HB ever has) and I couldn't be happier. I'm fixing to write a review on Herbivore's website too. I'm that happy with it. If you're on the fence about buying, take my word for it. You will love it.  P.s when I apply this at night, I wake up with fresh, plump skin!

Wow I am blown away! I ordered the sample size trio of oils from the company's website to try it before I bought the full size. I am thrilled! Today marks one week, just one week, that I have been using herbivore products. I am 27 years old, and I have been battling adult acne since I hit my twenties. With this and the other two facial oils from Herbivore, my skin, in just one week, looks and feels better than I ever remember! I have already purchased the full size of this one from Sephora. I plan to purchase full sizes of the other two from Sephora as well. I hope they start carying the entire line.

I really love this stuff. I use it every morning, but also at night sometimes before bed. It smells wonderful (very herbal) and, based on how much is left, won't need to be replaced any time soon. It keeps my oil under control during the day (yes, put oil on your face to keep your face from being oily, it really works). It doesn't necessarily prevent breakouts, but it also seems to keep them from getting out of control, and they tend to go away pretty quickly. I haven't tried any of the other versions of their facial oil, so I don't know how it stacks up. I was hesitant at first to drop so much money on this type of thing, but I love it. LOVE. IT.

Basically...I am beyond obsessed with this product and can't live without. I always thought acne was something you only had to deal with as a teenager...little did I know that evil adult acne exists! I was faced with cystic acne, a couple of spots that would pop up and hang around for months at a time. Lucky for me...Lapis Oil came to the rescue and since using this product, my cystic acne has all but disappeared. It's seriously a magical little miracle worker. I can't say enough good things about it.

I just got this oil to use along with my Phoenix oil since I love that one so much, but it's too heavy for day for me. This is the perfect lightweight oil to use in the morning. I wash my face and tone then put this on with a little sunscreen after. I get a perfect hydrated (not oily) base for my makeup, which is hardly any now because I just want to show off my new glow! I got the travel size from Herbivore, but will definitely purchase the larger size once warmer weather comes since I will probably start using this one day and night!
It's moisturizing but it irritated my skin and left bumps
Even it says doesn't clog your skin but I did get acnes from it.
It hydrate my skin without feeling too oily. It clam and balanced my skin.

I've been using this oil as my daily moisturizer for about a year now. It is great for my acne prone combination skin, not only not aggravating my skin's problems but actually helping to control redness and breakouts. I love that I can get these results with an all natural product, and the beautiful color and packaging is icing on the cake. I will continue to use this oil as long as they keep making it or until my skin changes and I switch to another of their oils.

I've used this for a couple of months now and I haven't thought of changing it. I love all HB products that I've tried. My skin is combination and this oil really makes it behave itself :D It's much more calm than it used to be.
I bought the travel size first and I went through it so FAST! I love that it isn't a thick cream but still moisturizes so well. And it smells so good!

First things first, this is the realest!! Lol, I am obsessed with the lapis facial oil. I can't get enough of it! When they say it's oil balancing, they arent playing around. I would recommend this for oily/combo skin and also for those with acne. This really helped with the one pimple that I get once a month. Other than that, I use this primarily for the oil control! When I say that this is the truth, it is not a joke. This honestly kept me matte with a velvet feel all day! This says alot since I live in the devil's armpit, also know as Texas.
I was super excited to try this product out. Unfortunately, it clogged up my pores and broke me out horribly!

reviews.review_title: facial oil doesn't get better than this!
reviews.review_text: No joke, this stuff is magic. I was so afraid that any type of facial oil would make me break out more, but this one doesn't! I've been using it in conjunction with the Blue Tansy mask, and it has very noticeably reduced the redness in my skin. so much so, that I don't feel the need to wear foundation all the time. I'm so thrilled with this product, and it's definitely worth every single penny. It will last forever, too. I'll be purchasing this again and again.
I use Lapis on a daily basis.

I have oily, sensitive, acne prone skin and was really hesitant to try a facial oil. The Lapis oil is totally life changing. It moisturises without making my face greasy, goes on well under my makeup, and it doesn't make me break out. I use this with the herbivore charcoal soap (also amazing) and the rose hibiscus face mist. Bonus: it smells great and the packaging is beautiful.I don't know how i lived so long without this product.
My roommate purchased this oil and said I should try it- glad I did because it's awesome!

reviews.review_title: hydrating, but not the best for my acne-prone skin
reviews.review_text: I bought a bottle of this at the beginning of the year and it's still not finished even after I've used it twice a day every day! In other words, this stuff will last you a loooooong time. In the spring, summer, and autumn, it was wonderful for my skin, but once winter hit, it no longer was up to snuff. But my skin always tends to break out whenever the cold weather comes, so my experience may not be yours. I've since switched to the Phoenix oil and my acne is clearing up again, so I'm thinking that for the warmer seasons I'll be using Lapis and for the cold seasons I'll be using Phoenix. It also removes makeup really well if you use a bunch and smells pretty good!

reviews.review_title: My Favorite Skincare Product Of All Time
reviews.review_text: I will never go without this product. This Lapis Facial Oil has balanced my skin by reducing redness, clearing any blemishes and keeps my skin hydrated while balancing my skin's oil production. I have shared this product with many friends and family members and they are loving the results of this nourishing oil! The scent is light but so wonderful I actually look forward to cleansing my skin! I have been using this oil for almost five months and now its a staple in my routine! LOVE LOVE LOVE!

reviews.review_title: Game Changing Product For Oily Skin
reviews.review_text: This oil is truly a game changer for those with oily skin. So lightweight, penetrates the skin much better than any moisturizer ever could. Smells like heaven! A must-have for anyone with breakout prone or oily skin, reduces breakouts and surface shine all without dehydrating the skin, which is what traditional acne/ oily skin products do, which ultimately only leads to further breakouts in addition to dry, flaky or irritated skin. Skip the drying products and buy this. Stat.

I started using facial oils as my daily moisturizer a little over a year ago and this is by far the best I've ever used and will ever use! I put it on right after cleansing with Herbivore's Pink Clay Cleansing Bar Soap and my face hasn't looked this good in years. I wouldn't say I had acne, but I had very small hard bumps that never formed heads covering the entire surface of my forehead that are now gone thanks to this product! A little goes a long way with this oil so it is worth every penny. Oh and the natural smell of this oil is GORGEOUS! Don't be hesitant about applying oil to your face, your skin needs it!

This is a really beautiful product (bottle included). I have moderate acne and oily skin. Short of using a mattifying product containing silicones (ick), I'll always have to blot mid-day, and this was no exception. BUT I've used this oil alone the last few mornings and I think I can ditch my usual salicylic acid treatment + moisturizer. Remains to be seen if I can replace the benzoyl peroxide treatment I'm using at night (and seeing some results with). I want to go back to natural products, and I'm seeing results from the Blue Tansy AHA + BHA Mask, so fingers crossed!

This Lapis Oil is amazing. It balances my sensitive, oily t-zone. After applying this oil, my skin feels supple and uber hydrated. Make up goes on great after this. The scent took a little getting used to (I've never used anything with blue tansy before), but I've come to love it. It's almost a mini aromatherapy session for me! A little really goes a long way. I love Herbivore Botanicals and I can't wait to try more of their products!  I hope Sephora starts stocking its travel-friendly rollerball counterparts - they are awesome for on-the-go!

This has been the best face oil I've ever used hands down. I've tried the tarte maracuja oil, the josie maran argan and the sunday riley luna and this is definitely my favourite out of all of them! I've been using it for around 2 weeks and noticed that my skin is less oily during the day, and it has calmed my eczema/dry patches on my cheeks and stopped me from breaking out all together! It smells lovely and the packaging is absolutely beautiful. Would recommend to anyone! Can't wait to try their Phoenix oil soon too!
This Lapis Balancing Oil not only works but it smells amazing! It is one of my favorite Herbivore Botanical products. I bought a smaller travel size and take it with me everywhere.

I've been trying various oils (different natural/organic brands) for my skin. My skin is combination, sensitive with occasional breakouts. This oil has done wonders!  The ingredients are perfect for even people with oily skin. Having oily skin doesn't mean you can't use an oil facial product! If anything, this oil has really helped my skin to be less oily. It really does not clog my pores and has actually helped diminish blemishes that were just starting to form.  You really don't need much at all, a little goes a long way. It smells so nice and fresh and I love the color too. This oil, used after the Blue Tansy face mask and rose/coconut spray is seriously the best combo for revitalizing your skin and preventing any future break outs. Even if you don't deal with blemishes, this oil definitely helps to balance the skin.  5 star product :)

As someone with oily, acne-prone skin, I did not think facial oils were for me. I was very wrong! After using this oil, my skin has really cleared up and looks so much more even. Even my foundation applies a lot smoother, and I do not become oily throughout the day. I am so thankful I found this facial oil!

Umm YUM! First things first... Herbivore's Lapis Oil smells amazing! I've been using this oil for several months at night before bed and love the way it makes my skin feel. I have sensitive, combo/oily skin & normally moisturizers/oils make me break out like crazy but I've seen an improvement in my skin since using Lapis Oil. I can't wait to try the Orchid Youth Preserving Oil!

reviews.review_title: Superb facial oil, smells divine too
reviews.review_text: I've used several facial oils over the years but this one is my current favorite. Superficially, the clear bottle that showcases the beautiful hue of the azure oil is classic and well-designed. The dropper dispenses evenly and is easy to control. The star is of course the oil. It's very hydrating without feeling heavy at all. I have combination (rather reactive) skin and it definitely helps balance out the oiliness without neglecting the dry areas. It also feels very comforting after I've shaved, and the anti-inflammatory properties help prevent signs of razor burn. The light scent is very soothing too. It's light enough that you can layer it under sunblock without feeling like an oil slick.

Love how the ingredients are all natural and good quality, and not to mention the packaging and color of the oil is beautiful!  Keeps the face nicely hydrated and surprisingly not too oily at all. Can't wait to try the Phoenix oil from Herbivore soon as well!
AMAZING! I Love it and it's all natural.
This facial oil is seriously amazing for acne prone skin. It helps take down the redness and helps prevent post acne hyper pigmentation. I will continue to purchase this.

I love this oil! At first, I was so scared of using oil on my acne prone and oily skin, but it works wonders! It balanced out my oils and helps with the redness as well. It's all natural which is a huge plus!

I can't get enough of Herbivore Botanicals' products. This is the only oil I've been able to use no matter what my skin is doing - I have very irritated, picky skin which changes its mind about products on a dime but this always soothes, hydrates but doesn't make me greasy at all. It's a HUGE amount for the money you pay, too. Holy grail, for sure.

reviews.review_title: The BEST Face Oil for Blemish-Prone Skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin that is blemish-prone, so when I first picked this oil up I was a little worried it wouldn't be hydrating enough for me. Turns out, this was the BEST oil I have ever used for my skin.  Not only does it moisturize completely, the Blue Tansy has antibacterial properties that helps to fight blemishes and clarify my complexion. My skin has never looked (or felt) better.

i really enjoyed this facial oil. it is light and easily absorbed but moisturizes all day. a little goes a long way and it lasts a LONG time. i can't speak to the effectiveness of it reducing redness as i did not notice a change. it has a pleasant yet subtle scent.

Recently I have gotten rid of all products in my skincare/body regimen that contain harmful/toxic chemicals/ingredients and am only using products that I know are all natural by carefully reading the ingredients list. This is how I came across Herbivore and so glad I found them! I have VERY oily skin and after using the Lapis Oil just one time, I knew it would become my must have skincare product! I have been using for 3 nights now and can already see and feel a difference in my skin. Before using this oil, I would have to blot my face at least 4-5 times a day and now I only have to blot once! Truly amazing stuff, BUY IT!

This has become a must have in my daily routine. I have been living in Bangladesh the last few months, and it has made my already oily skin even more greasy with lots of breakouts, since switching to this oil my skin has cleared up and evened out. I tried everything and am really pleased with this and the Phoenix oil. I use this one in the morning and Phoenix at night!!

I have tried the Sunday Riley Luna oil and love it but can't stand the price tag so I want to find the alternative for it. Herbivore maybe a better choice. The main ingredient is also blue tansy. It's moisturizing enough but not too greasy. Perfect for the winter time

I have very oily skin. I had used other sephora lotions on my face that I liked but i never felt like my skin was improving I just felt like I was maintaing it.  I was very skeptical about using an oil on my face I thought it would make me look greasy and shiny but once that stuff soaks in my face feels and looks amazing all day!  What I also love is that I have noticed my skin begin to actually heal since using this product. I absolutely love this stuff! (it pairs AMAZING with their charcoal face bar soap).

I'm pretty hesitant to try new product, as I have acne-prone and somewhat sensitive combinational skin. After seeing positive reviews about Herbivores I decided to give the mask / toner a try, but I thought maybe I should also check out their facial oil, even though I've never liked the idea of putting oil on my oily skin. However, the lapis oil feels lighter than a typical, creamy moisturizer. The pleasant smell is also a huge plus, as I have a hard time putting something that smells funky on my face (referring to lots of other fragrance-free products). I'm excited to see the more long term effect of the oil!

So I initially bought this because I was so intrigued by its beautiful blue color, but I must say, I am so happy with my purchase! My skin tends to be a bit oily but also very dry, so this is a great way to give me some moisture but still so lightweight. This product has an added benefit for people, like me, with problematic skin because of its anti-inflammatory, anti-bacterial properties. Also, it smells great!

this is the first face oil that really works for me. I have sensitive skin and anything will give me breakouts. I was very skeptical about this oil (since with others I would breakout). to my surprise my skin looks and feels great. I use it every other day.

I cannot say enough good things about this oil. It both hydrates your skin while keeping sebum and breakouts in check. If I get a red, painful pimple, which often happens on my chin in particular, applying this on it guarantees that it will be either significantly reduced or completely gone in a day. I used to apply benzoyl peroxide on breakouts and it would dry my skin out terribly, but those days are over now that I've found this!

So, I have naturally oily skin and have always struggled to find a balance between moisturizing too much or too little. This oil has been my answer! I've used it every night for the past three months and the quality of my skin has never been better- it's balanced, toned, and overall healthier. Not to mention their packaging is gorgeous. Overall extremely recommend.
This oil is FABULOUS! It leaves my skin feeling SO soft and moisturized, but not oily in the slightest! It also absorbs quickly into the skin. Will definitley be buying this again.

I bought a travel sized version to try out this facial oil and I really like what this does for my skin!! I have combination skin with an oily t zone and this oil keeps me from being too oily! I'm also sensitive to scents but I don't mind the scent of this oil. It smells kind of earthy and herbal-y to me. Lastly I love that there are no nonsense ingredients
I absolutely love this facial oil. I have used other oils in the past that were either too thick and didn't absorb or left my skin dry. It wears well under makeup and keeps my skin looking wonderful!

This oil feels slightly heavier but absorbs quickly. It has a very calming affect to irritated or red skin. I am combination/normal and it helped balance my skin. I love how effective the product is and its ingredients.

reviews.review_title: one of the best facial oils
reviews.review_text: I had been eyeing this product for a long time and i've finally been able to test it out. I was really skeptical about it at first because i have very oily and acne prone skin and i thought this would be too heavy for me. But it works beautifully on my skin. The jojoba oil moisturizes but also balances my skin and i've noticed my skin's condition improving.

The color is gorgeous. The oil goes on smoothly and sinks in right away. I kept reapplying thinking I forgot certain areas of my face until I realized that my skin was practically inhaling this stuff. No greasy streaks or residue, just pure moisture. I almost didn't believe it, seeing as it's oil after all. I really like the rollerball applicator and the size and amount should last me quite a while for a sample. The smell was very medicinal, but I have a sensitive nose and it's not very strong so I'm sure I'll get used to it.

I picked this up as part of a sampler pack of face oils. I've never used face oils before but my skin is very dry so I though they would help. I was amazed at how hydrating these oils were but not heavy or oily at all. They are super refreshing, smell great and really work. I noticed an immediate change in the texture of my skin (so smooth!), color (no more splotches!) and glow (luminous!). I would recommend this to someone of any skin type.

I cannot express what an AMAZING COMPANY HERBIVORE IS!!! This product (like their other ones) has changed my skin completely! I have noticed just after days my skin was smoother, less breakouts and it just glows! You can't go wrong with any of their products, I have switched my whole regimen to them entirely!

I used this for 4 weeks in order to give it a chance to work and reduce redness as my skin turned-over, but this only had negative effects. The t-zone of my combination skin just got steadily worse the longer I used this product. I was getting acne in larger amounts in areas I usually never see it. Once I stopped using this, my complexion cleared up.  My cheeks are also normally pretty red, and I had hoped this would help reduce redness, but I saw no effect. It was so disappointing, since I really wanted to love this brand - it's everything I desire out of a product and company.

Love this oil...and the beautiful packaging (my husband wants me to give him the empty glass bottle when I finish the oil). I use Herbivore Lapis in the morning, and Herbivore Phoenix at night. My skin feels fantastic and hydrated. I will definitely be repurchasing.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful oil that does not clog!
reviews.review_text: I have normal-combination skin that is very clog-proned. Most facial products (moisturizers, cleansers, etc.) clog my pores and give me bumps of hardened sebum. This oil does not clog my pores, even in the T zone and I closely inspected it! Having combination skin, products tend not to clog my cheeks, but I couldn't use anything on my T zone. I had no moisturizers for my T zone before I bought this.  While this gives me perfect moisture for my clog-proned T zone, it is not rich enough for my cheeks although I still feel comfortable using just this all over my face. It is not a dry oil like the Nude Rescue Oil, which is a bit too dry as an all over moisturizer. It is thick enough that there is a protective layer that glows on your skin, but has never clogged my pores. This makes my skin look healthy.  If every facial oil seems to break you out or clog your pores (plain jojoba or fancy mixtures) then definitely give this a try! If you have drier skin, you should probably layer with this one. If you have oilier skin, this is the best! My combination skin loves it all over. I just have to add some extra layers on my cheeks. I am so glad Sephora is carrying beautiful pure and natural brands like this. I never used to buy skincare from Sephora until recently. Definitely a must-have now.

There is a reason why this sold out so fast! I had to buy it directly from Herbivore because I was desperate to try it. The packaging is beautiful. Truly, a wonderful oil. Follow the directions by letting it soak in for 3 minutes before applying makeup. (I usually use this time to brush my teeth!). The redness and irritation that my skin usually has has gone down significantly. It also hasn't broken me out. If you have dewy skin goals, this will get you there!

At first I though maybe it was breaking me out because it was a new product, but after a few weeks I realized it was just breaking me out. :( I was really sad because I loved the way it moisturized my skin. I figured it probably wouldn't work though because my skin is super sensitive. It doesn't like ANY type of oils. :(

I just received this in the mail so I have only used it for one day, however I feel I need to write this review to express my thoughts! I ordered this lapis oil as well as the rose coconut facial spray. Upon opening the package I was in love with the packaging and label! There really is beauty in simplicity and I love when companies invest more in what it inside the bottle rather then outside. .... Anyway, I have combination skin and finding a face oil that doesn't make me look like an oil slick right after i apply it is REALLY HARD! As soon as i applied it (3 drops) I was concerned but upon massaging it into my skin (good for circulation) it absorbed quite nicely! The smell is not over barring and I have no signs of break outs. I'm sold on this product! I love that its natural and made it small batches for quality assurance as well!

This oil definitely reduces redness and makes my skin noticeably smoother. It works really well for combination skin. I feel hydrated all day but never oily and I haven't had any breakouts from it in the month I've used it. It does take a while to absorb, so my only caution would be to try to keep your bangs off your forehead as it absorbs. Quality product for the money!

reviews.review_title: Knocked off one star for the jasmine sambac oil
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this oil and it did wonder for my skin in the short time I've used it but I am allergic to the jasmine sambac oil in it that left me with itchy eyes. Too bad. I really liked it and wanted to keep it but it's got to back.

This product is amazing for combination skin. Keeps my hydrated where I'm dry, and keeps me balanced where I'm oily. I put this on at night and I wake up the next day glowy and even-toned. Will definitely purchase again.

I am a skin care junkie. I have tried (unsuccessfully) so many products to help balance my sensitive and combo-oily skin. And until I tried the Herbivore Lapis Oil, I had yet to find a day-time moisturizer that didn't make me look greasy or break me out. I stumbled onto this product when I did a search for oily skin oils. I have tried Argan, Marula, Maracuja, Camellia, and Coconut oil. ALL were just too heavy for day. This Lapis Oil is very, very different. It only takes two drops to cover my entire face!  Pros: -Has stopped my face from over-producing oil (my oil no longer breaks through my makeup.) -A little goes a long way (Just know that too much, and it will sit on the skin) -2 drops covers my entire face -Takes about 2-5 minutes to completely absorb -No moisturizer needed (for me, the Lapis Oil gives the perfect hydration) -Pleasant smell that dissipates in a few minutes -Slight glow without looking greasy -Soothing, calms the redness in my cheeks -Helps to puff my forehead lines so they are less deep looking -Fantastic as a makeup base (like a primer, but not greasy). I've used powder and fluid foundation with no problem. -Does NOT make me break out. Does NOT clog pores.  I know it's a bit pricey. But at the rate I'm going, I expect this to last at least 6 months. It is super concentrated. Just be careful not to drop the bottle, as it's made of glass.  I am VERY pleased with my purchase and am so thankful that I found a product that hydrates my skin perfectly.  Also, I found that the Perricone No Foundation Foundation Serum applied over the Lapis Oil is a winner! My skin looks flawless without looking greasy, flat or too matte.

reviews.review_title: Silky, not greasy, great for combo skin
reviews.review_text: I don't often give 5 star reviews but this facial oil warrants it. Of the handful of facial oils I've tried, this one absorbs the best and goes on silky instead of oily. The finish is so nice I'll even use it in the morning under my sunscreen, something I haven't been able to do with most oils since they tend to leave you shiny. This makes it a great fit for my combination skin. It hydrates the dry parts just right without causing my T-zone to get overly greasy.  This oil smells like jasmine (think the smell in jasmine green tea) due to the jasmine sambac in the ingredients. It's more floral than I like, but the scent dissipates quickly. The icing on the cake is the pretty packaging and the fact that this is a BIG bottle that I'm sure will last a long time! Definitely recommend.

I love this oil! I bought it in an effort to find a cheaper alternative to Sunday Riley's Luna oil (it's amazing, but so expensive). This isn't quite as strong as Luna, but it's so hydrating and fantastic with my hormonal acne. The smell is natural and earthy, not overpowering or undesirable like some natural oils.

This is one of the best beauty purchases I have made ever. I have sensitive, acne prone skin and using this has made a serious change in the appearance in my skin. The smell is divine and it soaks in amazing well.

If you break out this is for you. Oily skin will love this oil. I will never use regular moisturizer again. I LOVE this oil. I also use the other oils as well a few times a week but the lapis is my go to. It's perfect.

I have the sensitive, dry, acne-prone skin. The problem with buying intensive hydration creams is that they almost always cause me to break out! So I decided to search for an all natural brand and found Herbivore Botanicals a few years ago. This oil is what brought back my confidence about my skin! As well as having acne prone skin, I suffer from hyper-pigmentation and my acne blemishes/scars stay for 2-3 months before the redness goes away. It was so so discouraging feeling like my pimples were just adding up, when in reality, I'd only have a few spots, but the residual hyper-pigmentation made it seem like I had many many more. BUT, this oil was the one and only thing that helped reduce redness and the sensitivity of my skin. While the oil doesn't seep into my skin as well as the Phoenix Oil(which is also AMAZING) when I use this oil at night, I can look forward to waking up in the morning and seeing my redness being SO much lighter. This seriously has helped fade my spots so much, and it has worked wonders for the dry winter months. If you have oily or normal skin, it might be daunting to use more oil on your face, but if you don't use too much, and massage the oil into your skin, you'll just be left with hydrated skin. If you're like me and have drier skin, you can always add a few more drops for a more dewy finish. It also doesn't cause me any irritation or make me break out. This oil is seriously amazing, and I HIGHLY recommend the whole Herbivore Botanicals line if you're looking for a healthy, all-natural skin care line that is actually effective!

I have tried many facial oils and have skin that is sensitive and combination, with redness on the cheeks. Herbivore's Lapis oil is gentle, lightweight, and extremely calming. It's one of my favorites! The bottle is generously sized and the oil can easily be mixed with other products. It absorbs quickly.
